roles.title: Software Engineer / Team Lead
responsibilities: Lead agile refinement sessions
Perform peer code reviews
Manage code deployments

roles.title: Software Engineer
responsibilities: Develop new features for custom Program Management product
Develop CQRS-based microservice components in Ruby
Update Ruby-based APIs to support multi-tenancy
Created a JSON transform pipeline using jq
CI/CD pipelines with CircleCI and Azure DevOps

roles.title: Front End Developer
responsibilities: Developed React components for a site-wide design system
Implemented A/B testing scenarios developed by business team
Integrated a proprietary analytics system
Participated on the internal Tech Training Team

roles.title: Lead Developer
responsibilities: Developed web applications with Ruby on Rails
Developed iOS and macOS applications
Lead application architecture design sessions
Managed on-premise servers and network infrastructure
Routinely communicated directly with clients

roles.title: Multimedia Specialist
responsibilities: Created new media assets for web and disc-based delivery
Shot, directed, and edited client training videos
Developed Keynote and PowerPoint presentations

roles.title: Graphic Designer
